naslov: 6 APARTMANA Vinišće (Uvala Lubljeva) - video / čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: - prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. ! NAPOMENA: više detaljnih slika i videa eksterijera, interijera i okoliša objekta šaljemo na upit + tlocrte ! Ako tražite savršeno mjesto za odmor ili investiciju, ne propustite ovu priliku! Prodajemo prekrasnu kuću sa 6 apartmana u Vinišću (Uvala Ljubljeva), malom ribarskom mjestu. Kuća se nalazi na parceli od cca 1100m2, u mirnoj uvali Ljubljeva, udaljena svega stotinjak metara od kristalno čistog mora i šljunčane plaže. Svaki apartman ima zaseban ulaz i svaki kat je etažiran sa pripadajućom kuhinjom, kupaonicom, spavaćim sobama i dnevnim boravcima. Svaki apartman također ima prostranu terasu sa predivnim panoramskim pogledom na more i obalu. Kuća je kompletno namještena i opremljena, te parking za više vozila. Kuća ima i veliki vrt sa mediteranskim biljem i roštiljem. Kuća je idealna za obiteljski odmor, iznajmljivanje turistima ili kao stalni dom. - dozvole i vlasništvo uredno TEHNIČKI OPIS: - parcela cca 1100 (dva ulaza na parcelu) - stambeno brutto 628.30m2 / netto 521.94m2 + pomoćni objekat i prostrane podrumske prostorije - parking cca 450m2 / pogodno za ugradnju bazena ....................................................................................... - kuća građena 1990.godine / zadnja daptacija 2020.godine (detalji na upit) - detaljni planovi katova u tlocrtima eng /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// - sale of the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% of the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. ! NOTE: we send more detailed pictures and videos of the exterior, interior and environment of the building on request + floor plans! If you are looking for the perfect place for vacation or investment, don't miss this opportunity! We are selling a beautiful house with 6 apartments in Vinišće (Ljubljeva Bay), a small fishing village. The house is located on a plot of approx. 1100m2, in a quiet bay of Ljubljeva, only a hundred meters away from the crystal clear sea and pebble beach. Each apartment has a separate entrance and each floor is split level with its own kitchen, bathroom, bedrooms and living rooms. Each apartment also has a spacious terrace with a wonderful panoramic view of the sea and the coast. The house is fully furnished and equipped, and parking for several vehicles. The house also has a large garden with Mediterranean herbs and a barbecue. The house is ideal for a family vacation, rental to tourists or as a permanent home. - permits and ownership in order TECHNICAL DESCRIPTION: - plot approx. 1100 (two entrances to the plot) - residential gross 628.30m2 / net 521.94m2 + auxiliary building and spacious basement rooms - parking approx. 450 m2 / suitable for installing a swimming pool ................................................... ..................................... - house built in 1990 / last adaptation in 2020 (details on request) - detailed floor plans in floor plans #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
